awd_titl_txt: Acquisition of High Speed Flow Visualization and High Resolution Droplet Imaging Systems
awd_abstract_narration: Tsai  9601530    A high speed flow visualization and high resolution droplet imaging systems which will be purchased to support research and research training of both graduate and undergraduate students in engineering.  Major components of the systems are: an Oxford copper vapor laser strobe Model LS10-50 with pulse repetition frequency from single shot to 50,000 flashes per second, a CCD video camera, light sheet optics, an optical bench, Particle Image Velocimetry software, and a 100 MHz Pentium computer with an HP laser jet printer 5P.  The system will be used for research projects on atomization of slurry jets.     The requested instrumentation will be used to improve research and research training of both graduate and undergraduate students.  The Department started its graduate program four years ago and graduated five Master degree students last year; and it is among the top 15-20% in production of B.S. in Chemical Engineering in the Western United States.  ***
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: CALIFORNIA STATE UNIVERSITY LONG BEACH RESEARCH FOUNDATION
